sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react"; class Game extends Component { state = { score: 0, topScore: 0, imageArray: [{img :"aang.jpg", clicked: false}, {img :"appa.jpg", clicked: false}, {img :"azula.jpg", clicked: false}, {img :"boomy.jpg", clicked: false}, {img :"fire-lord.jpg", clicked: false}, {img :"iroh.jpg", clicked: false}, {img :"jeong-jeongg.jpg", clicked: false}, {img :"katara.jpg", clicked: false}, {img :"momo.jpg", clicked: false}, {img :"roku.jpg", clicked: false}, {img :"sokka-master.jpg", clicked: false}, {img :"sokka.jpg", clicked: false}, {img :"sukki.jpg", clicked: false}, {img :"tai-lee.jpg", clicked: false}, {img :"toph.jpg", clicked: false}, {img :"zuko.jpg", clicked: false}] } shuffleImgs = () => { var newArray = this.state.imageArray; for(let i = newArray.length-1; i > 0; i--){ const idx = Math.floor(Math.random() * i) const tempNum = newArray[i] newArray[i] = newArray[idx] newArray[idx] = tempNum } this.setState({imageArray: newArray}) }; componentDidMount() { this.shuffleImgs(); } handleClick = (event) =>{ event.preventDefault(); this.shuffleImgs(); } addImg = (img) => { } render() { return (

Clicky Game

Click an image to begin

Score: {this.state.score} | Top Score: {this.state.topScore}

Clicky Game

Click on an image to earn points, but don't click on any more than once!

); } } export default Game;
